response.original_title: The Spooktacular New Adventures of Casper - Volume Three
response.overview: To a spookifying assortment of delightful all-new animated adventures starring that high-spirited apparition, Casper, his living-impaired uncles, Stretch, Stinkie and Fatso, and the other offbeat residents of Whipstaff Manor! In "Spooly And Phil Meet The Monsters" Spooky answers a haunt-ad to become a spookster at a haunted castle, but soon finds he doesn't stand a ghost of a chance at beating out the monstrous competition! Then, in "Dead Of The Class," it's the 150th high school reunion for Casper's uncles, and they're just dying to find out what all their class-mates have done with their afterlives.  Also included in this volume of spectacularly spooky tales: "You Know You're A Ghost When...," "The Ghostly Trio," "The Trick's A Treat," "A Spooky And Pool Moment," and  "Y-Files"
response.title: The Spooktacular New Adventures of Casper - Volume Three
